title: Update Facebook on iOS now to keep it from draining your battery
text:
Update Facebook on iOS now to keep it from draining your battery 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Facebook users on iOS have had a sneaking suspicion that the app was starting to misbehave, to the detriment of their phone's battery life. ...
